content: Guangzhi is an optional yet very important Yaoguai Chief miniboss fight that you can encounter in Chapter 1 of Black Myth Wukong. Though he is not found along the main path through the Black Wind Mountain, defeating him will earn you an extremely useful Transformation Spell that should not be missed.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Guangzhi.md', within the main section titled 'Guangzhi'.
The content is as follows:
Guangzhi is an optional yet very important Yaoguai Chief miniboss fight that you can encounter in Chapter 1 of Black Myth Wukong. Though he is not found along the main path through the Black Wind Mountain, defeating him will earn you an extremely useful Transformation Spell that should not be missed.
